titles.title: Let It Be Said Of Us

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let it be said of us We were marked by forgiveness; We were known by our love And delighted in meekness. We were ruled by His peace, Heeding unity’s call Joined as one body, That Christ would be seen by all.{/lang-eng}
